sentences.en: My stepfather came into the scene when I was four.
sentences.cn: 在我四岁的时候，我的继父就出现了。

sentences.en: He was curious and so we went with his stepfather, Walt, joining us.
sentences.cn: 他很好奇，所以我们和他的继父沃尔特一起去了。

sentences.en: My stepfather was a former priest, one of the early black men ordained to the priesthood in the United States.
sentences.cn: 我的继父曾是一名牧师，是美国早期被任命为牧师的黑人之一。
